title: Chapter 1: The Farm - Stage 1
description: Our farmhand receives an unexpected royal summons.

story.name: Narrator
story.lines: The sun dipped low over the golden fields, casting long shadows across rows of wheat. A young farmhand named Caelan stood at the edge of the family land, wiping sweat from their brow, unaware that fate was already galloping toward them.

story.name: Narrator
story.lines: From the dirt path beyond the scarecrow-strewn fence came a rider clad in emerald and silver, the royal colors of King Alaric's court. The rider dismounted, bearing a scroll bound with wax and bearing the King's seal.

story.name: Stranger
story.lines: You are Caelan of the West Vale?

story.name: Caelan
story.lines: I am

story.name: Narrator
story.lines: The scroll trembles in your hands as you break the seal. “Your blood bears the mark of the gods,” it read. “Destiny calls you to rescue the Princess from the evil Lich King.”

story.name: Narrator
story.lines: The next morning, Caelan gathered together a group of friends and headed out from the farm. The journey would span forests thick with wolves, mountains haunted by spirits, and deserts scorched by fire. But the message was clear—they were the last descendant of the Old Gods, and the world once again needed their power.

title: Chapter 1: The Farm - Stage 2
description: Our farmhand receives an unexpected royal summons.

story.name: Narrator
story.lines: The journey continues...

story.name: Hero
story.lines: I must see this through, no matter the cost.
